name: Pieces of You
description:
Pieces of You, tells the story of a disillusioned adult whose world has become dull. Explore enchanting environments, solve puzzles, and collect remnants to regain what you’ve lost. Reconnect with your past, and return colour to the city in this bittersweet adventure.

 What wonders will you discover?

Features

  • Side-scroller 2D platformer
  • Beautiful hand drawn art style
  • Captivating story 
  • Intricate world design and immersion
  • Interesting and unique puzzles
  • Multiple levels with increasing difficulty and length
